properties.Name: FinancialStatementLineAggregatedLedgerAccount
properties.Description:
Each line of a financial statement may contain values that are aggregates of the values for one or more ledger accounts. 

The ledger accounts that are aggregated for each line are documented here.

Columns.Name: LegalEntityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Statement.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the financial statement is prepared.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the financial statement is prepared.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementLineId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Statement Line.

Columns.Name: LedgerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Ledger.

Columns.Name: LedgerAccountNumber
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Ledger Account.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementLineAggregatedLedgerAccountNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the aggregation of the ledger account on the financial statement line.
